pages.text:
Monster mini golf
Fun For the Whole Family
It happened late one night in 2004… in the small quiet town of Danielson, Connecticut. While their neighbors slept, Christina and Patrick Vitagliano, a seemingly normal couple, sat at their kitchen table and brainstormed their next business opportunity. After hours of penciled ideas and eraser shavings, they landed on one of the most Frightening (yet ridiculously FUN) Family Entertainment ideas ever perpetrated on the American People…Monster Mini Golf
®
!
This version of Mini Golf would be different…and we mean
DIFFERENT
than
ANY
other Miniature Golf or Family Entertainment venue that anyone has ever seen. It will be uniquely dedicated to the sheer enjoyment of humans of all ages… FUN?!
And just like that, mini golf was moved indoors and under the glow of blacklights… thus, the Millennium Falcon of Miniature Golf and Family Entertainment was born!
OUR FACILITY
Our glow-in-the-dark mini golf Courses are populated with animated “Monsters” of international theme quality, they move, talk and at times tell silly jokes. The blacklights bring to life worldclass hand-painted, locally inspired artwork depicting sites and symbols unique to each location to give local flavor. All of this creative engagement, coupled with popular music, disco balls, moving concert lighting and on course games and entertainment make us a must-see experience in any town!
oUR ATTRACTIONS
18-hole Monster-Themed, Blacklight Miniature Golf Course (and adventure) like nothing you have ever experienced
Video and Redemption Game Arcade and Prize Center
*Laser Tag
*Bowling
*Laser Maze
*Virtual Reality
*Stella’s Kitchen
Activities marked with a * are location dependent. Check out the
location nearest you
to see all available attractions!
OUR EXPERIENCE
Our product is Guest Experience; Miniature Golf just happens to be the vehicle used to deliver it! The sole goal of Monster Mini Golf
®
is to provide a wide variety of affordable experiences in a fun, family-friendly, alcohol-free atmosphere. Age-appropriate Guest Experience is our product and memorable family entertainment are our top priorities. Mini Golf is for Everyone!
MONSTROUS MISSION
“Our vision is to provide every guest – whether they’re 5 or 95 – the most unique, affordable, engaging, and FUN family entertainment option! We aim to break the mold on how miniature golf, and family entertainment in general, is viewed and experienced. With over 30 centers and growing, Monster Mini Golf is your go-to destination for one-of-a-kind family entertainment!”
–
Christina Vitagliano, Founder
.entry-content

Privacy Policy

Events
Are you tired of the same old boring company or group event and looking for something unique and fun to entertain and invigorate your friends, family, or co-workers? If so, look no further than Monster Mini Golf! Group events are great for both adults and children alike. Whether it’s a birthday party, field trip, group event,
valentines day date
or fundraiser, all can enjoy unlimited entertainment and relax in our private haunted mansion event rooms.
We guarantee to get the laughs rolling and the competitive juices flowing, no matter the event!
Birthday Parties
Field Trips
Group Events
Fundraisers
BIRTHDAY PARTIES
We offer more than just another simple birthday celebration; we create exciting memories for children’s
birthday parties
and
adult birthday parties
that last a lifetime. That means adults/parent guests get to have fun, too.
Our experience includes:
90-minute reservation of one of our private Haunted Mansion rooms
In-room age-appropriate hosted activities
18 holes of Monster Mini Golf (adult and parent guests golf for free)
Arcade play and prize center fun
Parents also love us
because we set up the room, handle all service needs, and clean up when it’s all over
Learn More
FIELD TRIPS
Whether it’s a rainy-day activity or you’re looking to pre-plan all your summer activities for your daycare, school, or camp program, Monster Mini Golf is the perfect venue for your next action-packed field trip! Monster Mini Golf
®
provides a physically and mentally stimulating experience for children filled with adventure, games, prizes, smiles, and loads of laughs!
Learn More
GROUP EVENTS
See why companies love Monster Mini Golf as a
corporate venue
, which includes an entire dedicated staff to host the event and unique activities that transform team camaraderie.
Tradeshows
also have enough room for setup, and clients are at ease with the casual and fun atmosphere.
Contact our team
to discuss any details and special requests.
Our group events include:
Private Haunted Mansion event rooms
18 hole mini golf competition
Arcade time
Prizes and fun awards
Additions include:
Audio-visual equipment (used for company events and varies by location)
Additional arcade time
Other applicable location attractions
Food and refreshments
Learn More
DATE NIGHTS
Keep the flames of your relationship burning bright by taking your loved one on a unique outing they will never forget. Laugh and love your way through the intimate date night under blacklights and neon colors that add an extra layer of fun.
Couples will tackle animatronic monsters together and use each other to help win mini challenges throughout the course and set high scores in the arcade center.
Find a location
nearest you, and show your loved one you still know how to keep them on their toes.
Learn More
SPRING BREAK
Families have a climate-controlled, safe, and out-of-this-world venue to create new spring break experiences. Purchase a family package to get discounted prices on popular activities and spend the day getting lost in another dimension filled with fun and electric bonding moments.
Make sure to reserve your spot ahead of time because
Monster Mini Golf
gets busy during spring break, so you want to make sure you guarantee your spot. You can finally pick a spring break venue the entire family can enjoy.
Learn More
FUNDRAISERS
Monster Mini Golf
®
offers flexible fundraising options designed to fit any organization’s needs and its member’s budgets. All fundraising options are
priced per person
and discounted from the normal retail price to pass along savings to your organization’s members and allow your organization to raise your desired revenue generation goals.
Learn More
Fun for the Entire family
At Monster Mini Golf
®
, we love what we do!
Find Us Near You
.entry-content

Pembroke Pines GROUP EVENTS
Company Events That Rock (And Roll)!
Tired of the same old boring Company or Group Event? Looking for something unique and fun to entertain and invigorate your friends, family or co-workers? If so, look no further than Monster Mini Golf! Group Events are great for both adults and young adults alike. Companies, youth groups, clubs, etc. can all enjoy unlimited entertainment and be able to relax in our private haunted mansion event rooms. We guarantee to get the laughs rolling and the competitive juices flowing as each event features:
18 Holes of Monster Mini Golf
Arcade Game Play
Prizes and Fun awards
ADDITIONS INCLUDE:
Additional Arcade Game Play
Food and refreshments
Group Event Package Options
Fiend Fest
Skeleton Soiree
The Beast
18 Holes of Monster Mini Golf
Arcade Game Play
$15.00 per guest
$15.00 per person
$20.00 per person
Bowling Attraction (1 Game per guest)
Climbing Tree Attraction (1 per guest)
Minimum Number of Participants
12 guests
12 guests
30 guests
Package Price
$25.00 per guest
$31.00 per guest
$38.00 per guest
OPTIONAL ADDITIONS
(ALL ATTRACTIONS)
Bowling Attraction (Unlimited for 30 minutes)
$50.00 per lane
Action Climbing Tower Attraction (unlimited for 30 minutes)
$95.00
Virtual Reality Attraction (per play)
$8.00
Large Cheese Pizza
$19.95
Large Pepperoni Pizza
$21.95
Pitcher of Fountain Beverage
$6.95
Group Event pricing starts for a group of 12 participants. Monster Mini Golf can accommodate groups of all shapes and sizes and even have private event and facility buyout options should you desire additional privacy and exclusivity.
Booking a Group Event at Monster Mini Golf is easy, simply contact us to start the booking process.
Contact Us

Privacy Policy

Explore Our Monstrous Group Events
Are you tired of the same old boring group events and looking for something unique and fun to entertain and invigorate your friends or family? If so, look no further than Monster Mini Golf
®
! Group events are great for both adults and young adults alike. Companies, youth groups, clubs, etc., can all enjoy unlimited entertainment.
Group Events That Rock (And Roll)!
Book your next group event at Monster Mini Golf
®
and relax in our private haunted mansion event rooms. We guarantee to get the laughter going and the competitive juices flowing as each key event features the following:
Private Haunted Mansion event rooms
18-hole mini golf competition
Unlimited arcade game play
Prizes and fun awards
…and much more.
ADDITIONS INCLUDE:
Additional arcade game play
Food and refreshments
Featured attractions
Customize a group event for adults or kids with multiple options from our featured attractions.
Mini golf:
Our indoor glow-in-the-dark 18-hole Monster Mini Golf course is perfect for a high-stakes competition with your group or a team-building event!
Arcade:
Try your hand at Skee Ball, Prize Cranes, and more! There’s something for everyone, and you can cash in the tickets you win for a prize!
Laser tag:
Laser tag is an amazing team-building activity. Teams that work together to defeat opponents and have the last player standing win!
Laser maze:
To win, you must get through the gaps in the laser maze without hitting any beams. It’s more challenging than you think and will have you bending and stretching more than a game of Twister!
Virtual reality:
Choose from several virtual reality adventures we offer. Whether it’s your first or third virtual reality outing, there’s something new to discover virtually!
Bowling:
Our mini lanes are perfect for the whole family, so whether you choose our venue for a corporate event, field trip, or birthday party, bowling is a fantastic activity for people of all ages!
Planning a Team Building Event? Click to Learn More!
Monster Mini Golf Group Events for All
At Monster Mini Golf, planning large group events is a breeze, and we have something for everyone planning an upcoming key event.
Birthday Party Venue
Young and old kids can create special memories by playing games and winning prizes. Monster Mini Golf birthday parties offer opportunities to burn some energy while staying indoors in a safe environment. This makes keeping track of guests easier and ensures everyone’s having a fantastic time. Contact us to
book a birthday party
featuring your favorite activities.
Corporate Event Venue
We’re the perfect corporate event venue for team outings, offering opportunities for friendly competition between divisions and team-building exercises.
Find a location near you
for your next corporate outing.
Is your team in town for a trade show/convention
? Monster Mini Golf is a great, fun thing to do while in the area!
Field Trip Venue
Monster Mini Golf is a fantastic outing that’s visually stimulating, promotes learning opportunities, and encourages physical activity. Call us when you’re preparing to
host a field trip!
Learn about our affordable packages and how to use a Monster Mini Golf field trip to inspire learning in art, language arts, math, and physical education.
How To Find A Monstrous Event Venue Near Me
Monster Mini Golf
®
can accommodate groups of all shapes and sizes and even have private event and facility buyout options should you desire additional privacy and exclusivity.
Find a location
Gallery
Group Event FAQs
How do I build my group event?
We’ll need a bit of information first before confirming your event, so please be sure to have the following information when you’re ready to book:
Date of event
Location
Number of guests
Age group
Your phone number
Your email address
Your first and last name
Any details or special requests for the day
Once you submit the information, we’ll get working on your group event right away!

Privacy Policy

CONTACT MONSTER ENTERTAINMENT
Monster Entertainment is the Franchisor for Monster Mini Golf
®
Family Entertainment Centers. Please contact us directly if you have questions and inquiries on potential franchise opportunities, available territories, or potential corporate partnerships or system-wide brand marketing opportunities.
For local Monster Mini Golf
®
store inquiries or issues, please contact your local Monster Mini Golf
®
store first. However, if you feel that you have not received proper attention to a local store matter, please contact us and let us know.
Address:
Monster Entertainment
Charlotte, North Carolina
Phone:
(704) 755-5722
Contact The Corporate Office
